attributes.additional_details:
Create Referendum with Yes or No answers to:
1)Deportation of criminal after prison sentence to country of origin with statutory imprisonment if attempt is made to re-enter any other country in  the European Union: even if citizenship has been acquired.
2)Seizure of assets; including 'legitimate' businesses, under the names of other family members. These are used for money-laundering and harbouring new members.
3)Supporting Members of the European Parliament to make this applicable throughout the European Union.
4)Renewal referendum in 20years.
